title: PBE
body: Why do I have only 3000 RP and 5 BE

replies.body: The [**PBE Stipend**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/T6INEVkN-store-back-online-there-are-changes-to-rp-and-blue-essence) was changed. You're welcome to voice your opinions on that of course, but H&S isn't the best place. Hit up the [**PBE Boards**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback)!
